definition: circle/round/circular/spherical/(of the moon) full/unit of Chinese currency (yuan)/tactful/to make consistent and whole (the narrative of a dream or a lie)
table/desk/classifier for tables of guests at a banquet etc
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: This excludes several hundred round-table meetings where numerous companies were present.
sentences.chinese: 這還沒有包括數百次有多家公司代表在場的圓桌會議。

sentences.english: A high-level round-table conference and two parallel seminars will be held during the two-day symposium.
sentences.chinese: 本次研討會設有高層圓桌會議和兩個平行研討會。

sentences.english: Recordings of previous roundtables are all available here.
sentences.chinese: 以往的圓桌會議錄音也可以找到。

sentences.english: The recording of this roundtable can be found here.
sentences.chinese: 圓桌會議記錄可以在博客中找到。

sentences.english: You can register for the next roundtable here.
sentences.chinese: 您可以在這裏報名參加下一次的圓桌會議。

sentences.english: We are still open-minded about any round-table conference.
sentences.chinese: 對任何圓桌會議，我們仍然可以考慮接受。

pinyin: Shi4 jie4 Jing1 ji4 Lun4 tan2

definition: UNESCO, United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization

pinyin: Ya4 Tai4 Jing1 He2 Zu3 zhi1

definition: Davos (Swiss ski resort)/Davos world economic forum (WEF)
